titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: Lionel and I motored into Durham, where I visited the book–shop, and bought Christmas presents. Then I went to the Castle, & instituted the new Vicar (Betts) of Collierley. Also, I licensed Llewelyn to New Shildon, & took him back to lunch at the Castle. Then Lionel & I walked in the Park for more than an hour: after which I fell to preparing my Charge for the Ordination Candidates.
